website_summaries.verdict: Modern and sleek with concealed screws.
pros: Polished stainless steel looks like chrome but costs less
Looks great in a contemporary bathroom
cons: Hardware included, but some found it hard to locate in the packaging, where it was inadvertently discarded

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this product!
customer_reviews.text: This hook is just what I was looking for to hang my shower caddy since I didn't want to hang it from my shower head. It was SUPER easy to install and is sturdy enough to support all of my shower essentials. The depth of the hook provided exactly enough clearance to allow the caddy to hang flush against the shower tiles and the matte black finish matched perfectly with the black caddy I purchased from Target. Zero negatives about this item, it's excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Stef330

customer_reviews.title: Has held up well.
customer_reviews.text: Bought three of these, might need a fourth. I attached two outside the shower as towel hooks for myself and the missus. They worked great. Bought another one for inside the shower. I didn't want to drill throughu brand new tile, so I decided to try and trust the glue provided. I followed the directions exactly and was surprised that it all actually worked. The little hook has been holding up wash clothes for a month now without an fuss. I gave it a little tug in the beginning to see if it was really attached, and it didn't even budge. Nice nickel color, not going to match your chrome kholer mixing valve exactly if that is a concern.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional at any Price
customer_reviews.text: Over the past year I've bought over a dozen bathroom accessories from KES (towel bars, hooks, towel rings, etc.) in both polished and brushed finishes. All of them --including these -- are exceptionally well made and durable. They really are 304 stainless steel: no rust, no spotting, no corrosion. And not just the actual accessories, the screws and mounting brackets are stainless steel also. I've spent twice as much for bathroom accessories from internationally known names that were not half as nice as these. I highly recommend them. The designs are elegant, the quality is exceptional. The price is low for what you receive.
customer_reviews.author: FrankK

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy practical hook
customer_reviews.text: The installation simple and straightforward. Drill two holes, screw in the bracket, place the hook over the bracket, and tighten the allen screw underneath. The hook works well with both robes and towels. The hook matches nicely with the Style Selections 3" Chrome Cabinet Hardware (Item # 59609) sold at Lowe's.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Top Quality Towel Hook
customer_reviews.text: The fit and finish of these is top notch. I thought from an appearance standpoint, these matched our Delta Trinsic towel bars better than the Trinsic line towel hoinsic. These parts are polished to a high luster to pass easily for a chrome plated finish, which is what I was looking for. The only thing to be aware of is that this general style of towel hook is more 'slippery' than the old school coat hooks that have two pointy prongs. But if you double up on the thickness that goes between the post and the wall, it will stay put without problem. And we tried this with both hand towels and bath towels and both worked fine.
customer_reviews.author: BoiseDick

customer_reviews.title: But the finish looks quite good. I'm not entirely sure my huge towel will ...
customer_reviews.text: I have not mounted the hooks yet. But the finish looks quite good. I'm not entirely sure my huge towel will stay in place, but it should. I noticed A LOT of negative reviews complaining that all of the mounting hardware was not included. I believe that is because those people did not realize that the mounting bracket is attached to the hook itself when shipped. It is only necessary to use the allen wrench to loosen the bracket from the hook and you are good to go. It might be worth the shipper making that more obvious to purchasers who are looking for the mounting bracket.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Wow this is so high quality for the price! I looked at Lowes, Home Depot and even Walmart and there was nothing that was modern and high quality that wasn't over $100 for a set of just a couple items. I needed a towel bar, a towel ring, a towel hook and a toilet paper holder and all of that would have costed me $200 but with this KES brand it costed me maybe about $75. So very happy with my decision to go with this brand and they have lasted a whole year without rust, the sturdiness is still there and they are still GORGEOUS. If you are on the fence about this, just trust me and buy them!
customer_reviews.author: M. Lopez

customer_reviews.title: terrible instructions included.
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is good, the instructions are awful. If you’d like to use the adhesive method they don’t mention how to properly use the glue it comes with. It’s in the photo of the items included but there’s no step for it. I wound up abandoning the adhesive method for the screw method. the photos for that were also not complete and not clear but I was able to figure it out at least. If you require detailed instructions (or complete ones) then maybe pick a different product.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and look great!
customer_reviews.text: These hooks are awesome! I just bought a new house and had racks for hanging towels in the bathroom. I tried an over the door rack, but it ended up damaging the door and making me very upset in the process. I bought two of these hooks to hang on the way. They were so easy to install, you don't even have to worry about using a level because you can adjust them at any time. Took me about 10 minutes and my bathroom was forever changed. The stainless steel looks great and has held up really well so far (had them about 2 months).
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Would Buy Again
customer_reviews.text: The allen wrench that came with the hook broke as soon as I try to loosen the set screw. It seems to be a very fragile cheap little wrench. Fortunately, we have an allen wrench set with the size that was needed. Then it was just a matter of drilling the screws into the base plate, sliding the hook onto the base plate and tightening the set screw. We screwed into a stud behind the drywall so we did not have to use the anchors. Seems to be tight and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Butler

customer_reviews.title: Advertising "no drill" needed not accurate with enclosed glue system.
customer_reviews.text: Advertising "No Drill" is not accurate. Enclosed glue system did not work all on a clean painted wall. Only warning about their glue was that it may disfigure the wall when removed. Followed instructions using enclosed glue and red strip and waiting 48 hours per instruction. Fell off immediately. I ended up using 3M Command tape which worked fine. Otherwise excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Paul L

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy robe hook
customer_reviews.text: I chose the glue in option instead of the screws. Both come together. So far so good. Once glued in place, I gave it a few hours before I attached the actual hook. It states in the instructions to give it 48hrs of dry time, so that’s what I did. Seems to be holding so far. Good to know I have the screw options if the adhesive fails. The screws may be too long or short depending on what you’re needing it to attach to.
customer_reviews.author: Tonisha

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Hand Towel Solution
customer_reviews.text: My bathroom has dual sinks and dual vanity cabinets, but the towel ring for the hand towel was installed over by the light switch for some reason. I've been looking for a small towel ring, but the don't exist. Turns out a ring would have been a big mistake because I would have needed to mount it up high so that the towel didn't hang too low. I stumbled across this product by accident and am SO GLAD! Look at the 2 photos. PERFECT SOLUTION!!!! Thanks KES products!!
customer_reviews.author: Joanie Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Good Value - No corrosion
customer_reviews.text: Like the simple clean lines of this towel holder we purchased for our bathroom. We wanted something where the profile was shallow and the ease of not "threading" the hand towel through a traditional "ring" system. Hate those. This is stainless so it won't corrode and modern. Perfect. Affordable cost. Hubs drilled for installation. No big thing. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: A Guy & A Gal

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and a great product!
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly what I needed! I did not buy it to hang a coat, but rather to be able to hang a towel right after I come out of the shower (I have a walk-in shower). It is a bit bigger than expected but that is actually a good thing since it is able to hold my towels without any problems. The handles on my cabinets are similar so I like the fact that it matches the look. Overall, great product! Very sturdy and does not feel cheap at all. I am very satisfied with my purchase and will most likely purchase another one for the second bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: The Final Verdict

customer_reviews.title: Sloppy finish but inexpensive.
customer_reviews.text: The design is clean I chose it because of the price. Inexpensive compared to the better designed ones that cost 4X the price. I couldn't justify spending more than $12 for a single hook. The design is sloppy in the finishing touches. The hanging part doesn't fit well to the round part that you drill on the wall. I also bought the single rod toilet paper holder which has the same issue.
customer_reviews.author: NPF

customer_reviews.title: Good Hook
customer_reviews.text: I used in a bathroom as a hand towel hook and it works just fine. No idea why other reviews said it wouldnt hold. I use smaller hand towels and it also holds a regular larger towel just fine. After my towel rack was pulling out of the wall per those lame drywall mounts I had to patch and just went with this. I screwed into a stud and it was easy. Cant comment on the adhesive.
customer_reviews.author: peteike

customer_reviews.title: It's easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I used this hook for a hanging shower caddy in our bathroom. It is strong enough to hold the metal shower caddy with multiple bottles of shampoo and shower wash. It's easy to install, and very attractive. I'm very happy with my purchase and would buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Our Bath Towels
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, fit perfectly in small space, and they look great. My only wish is that we had found these sooner. We were using 3M Command hooks to hang our bath towels next to the shower. My husband's kept falling off the wall every 3-4 months. I was tired of replaying the strip and the paint was being ripped from the wall. I painted before installing these hooks. Great investment!
customer_reviews.author: IvyInDallas

customer_reviews.title: Quality wall towel hook at a great price
customer_reviews.text: First, the delivery of the wall hook was the usual prime Amazon speed which was great. It came with two mounting options, drilled or adhesive application. I chose the adhesive application as It was being installed on a hollow craftsman bathroom door. Installation instructions were straight forward and easy to follow. With regard to the hook itself, I am throughly pleased with the quality and the look of this product. One can’t go wrong with this wall hook.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Inez Evans

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Product Instructions was Frustrating
customer_reviews.text: I like the sturdiness and the modern style of this robe hook. The enclosed installation instructions, however, were for 2 other products, not the robe hook. I had to research to find instructions, and they were not great. The installation issue was very frustrating for me. The product was a little smaller than expected
customer_reviews.author: Leavesintrees

customer_reviews.title: Fell off
customer_reviews.text: Admittedly, I wanted to simply stick it to the wall and be done with it. I did this, hung my towel on it, and now I have a mess on the wall where the drywall torn when the towel and hook fell off the wall. I loved the look of it. Now, I just have to figure out how to fix my wall and hang the thing in a sturdy manner. Shucks.
customer_reviews.author: RosieV

customer_reviews.title: Work great
customer_reviews.text: I have bought several of these in the 4 set and singles. Great by the door for keys and in the bath for hanging pumice stones or foot brushes. Try to post it out of the path of your water spray. I have had no problems on dry wall or shower porcelain tile.
customer_reviews.author: AussiegirlIngridTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and practical
customer_reviews.text: I used them for coats and purses in the entry hallway. I installed 4 at the same time so it was easy to keep them in line. Since I had more space I ordered a 5th one later. They look clean and contemporary. Two screws to anchor, should be ok with waight of purses.
customer_reviews.author: Busy mom

customer_reviews.title: Glue only
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t come with the metal component required to install with screws. The metal component is pictured on the instructions, as if it is an included piece, but doesn’t exist. The only way to adhere is with glue (despite instructions and included screws). I purchased 2x incase was a packaging error.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon J Davis

customer_reviews.title: Works great with screws. Adhesive not so much
customer_reviews.text: As described but be prepared to use the screws The adhesive is garbage and it fell of on the first use I was planning on drilling anyway but i said “what the heck let’s try this. If it works great if not whatever”
customer_reviews.author: Matthew A

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Great modern hook, with a very nice consistent finish. It was a great price and easy to hang, I used anchors and screws and did not use the gluing option. Liked it so much for our bathroom, I am planning to order two more.
customer_reviews.author: CW

customer_reviews.title: HIgh quality!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful finish and solidly made. The mounting hardware is very well made too and makes for a snug, sturdy fit. I bought these for my vacation condo... I like them so much, I'd like to replace the ones in my home with these. I'm a big fan of the cylindrical brushed stainless look. These match the cabinet pulls in the bathroom, tying everything together. Nicely packaged too!
customer_reviews.author: J. Ford

customer_reviews.title: Modern Looking!!
customer_reviews.text: These are very attractive and good quality hooks. I installed them on the back of all of my bathroom doors and they look very modern and nice. They also hold robes, clothes, towels, very well. Highly recommend. No issues with rusting either and I’ve had them for a while!
customer_reviews.author: Lola Marie

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and shows no sign of rust
customer_reviews.text: We installed these outside by the pool for people to hang their towels. I was worried they would start to rust, but after 2 winters now, they show no sign of rusting. They are sturdy and definitely deserve 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: EmilyT

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and design
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and quality of this hook, especially for the price. Our contractor used extra mount to make these REALLY secure. Look more modern and clean than the hooks I ordered that were 10 times the price. I sent those back, kept these, and couldn’t be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Steffen

customer_reviews.title: Good hook
customer_reviews.text: Apon installing this into my bathroom the set screw stripped and I had to go buy another one. Other than the quality of the set screw this would of been 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan fisher

customer_reviews.title: Uses for bath towels and hand towels!
customer_reviews.text: We bought 3 of these. Using one to hang a bath towel for when you get out of the shower. Using the other two as hand towel hooks by our his and hers sinks in lieu of the normal ring towel holders. Makes it easy to grab the towel to wipe your face and such. Love the clean look of these hooks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: looks nice but missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Its a nice looking hook, good quality however the instructions included to install were for a completely different hook. Additionally it did not bring the proper hardware to install it.
customer_reviews.author: rosalind schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect!
customer_reviews.text: It gives you two options, stick onto the wall or drill into the wall. We drilled to be safe since we intended to hang up wet towels on it. It was easy to install and works great as a towel holder!
customer_reviews.author: Cait

customer_reviews.title: Attractive, functional and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 3 hooks and use them in the kitchen to hang pizza peel and 2 decorative cutting boards. The hooks have a modern look and match the stainless appliances. They are well made and easy to install. Very sturdy and they look great!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie B

customer_reviews.title: beautiful, solid piece
customer_reviews.text: This looks like something that would sell at West Elm for $40 dollars. It's a solid, well machines piece of metal and will last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: WilsonWilsonJr

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: These went in our bathroom to hang towels on. The install was quick and easy and they are extremely sturdy, made of thick metal & look expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Spiegel

customer_reviews.title: Heavy metal. Nice chrome. Holds bath towels nicely!
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Heavy metal, nice real chrome, and super easy to install. Instructions were easy for me to follow. Long enough to hold bath towels. Very sturdy. Very happy. I’ll buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Christie

customer_reviews.title: Changed my opinion of towel hooks
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE these hooks. Purchased two to put parallel on a tight wall outside our shower. Our new house did not come with a towel bar for some reason and I hated the idea of traditional hooks. These went above my expectations and are modern, study, and have work well over the past six months.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Modern and different
customer_reviews.text: Love these and ordered to match our other fixtures for our bathroom remodel. We couldn’t be happier! Such a nice change from a towel rack holder
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Needed more towel space in guest bathroom
customer_reviews.text: They fit behind the door and hold wet bath towels when we have lots of fuests. I like that they are there but not really noticeable unless you need them, We put two up.
customer_reviews.author: mombatt

customer_reviews.title: I don't like the coloring
customer_reviews.text: I don't like the coloring. I t has a yellowish tint in it. I bought all my fixtures in shiny chrome. This color was off and did not match the rest of the fixtures.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Nice hooks.  Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: These are nice. Hollow, but well made and easy to install. Just make sure to think about where you're putting them and get the right hardware to do so.
customer_reviews.author: Mikes Shoppin’ Reviews

customer_reviews.title: It holds up towels wonderfully
customer_reviews.text: I had a stylish towel hook that wasn't very good at it's job. The new KES SUS 304 Stainless Steel Coat hook Single Towel/Rob Cloths hook for Bath, is really good at it's job. It also looks very modern like the towel hooks I see at some of the hotels I stay in. Installation was very simple, I used the provided hardware and it worked fine. I'm excited to get out of the shower and have my towel on the hook where I left it and not slumped in heap on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: Nice little shower/bathroom hanger
customer_reviews.text: I bought this USED to save a couple bucks versus buying a new one. Item arrived with just a tiny blemish on it, which, to me, was not a big deal....hardly noticeable and worth the savings. Works well hanging large towels on while I'm in shower!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, cheap price
customer_reviews.text: These look great and they're easy to install. I am unsure about durability, but they seem to be holding up pretty well. Also, it's cheaper to buy two single packs than a double pack, keep that in mind.
customer_reviews.author: gdrinot

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THESE HOOKS!
customer_reviews.text: I use towels with the loop on them, so these towel hooks work perfectly, look awesome, are very stylish and are perfect for my needs!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca S.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t stick
customer_reviews.text: I used the adhesive option and within a week, it came off my bathroom wall.
customer_reviews.author: J V 👾

customer_reviews.title: Easy Installation!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little towel hook. It’s well made, very sturdy and even easier to install. I highly recommend this item!
customer_reviews.author: Donald

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t come with instructions
customer_reviews.text: The hooks are beautiful however the instructions are straight forward. The set of instructions I received were for a toilet paper role. I had to google a video for instructions. They are sturdy once drilled into the wall & the design is beautiful
customer_reviews.author: OSpencer

customer_reviews.title: Great holder.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for kids that tear things up. Very sturdy and you don't have to deal with that spring load thing that ends up on the floor. I attached it to the side of a bathroom cabinet. Highly recommend. This was actually meant for the toilet paper holdet. The towel holdet is great too for a hand towel or robe.
customer_reviews.author: BDS

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I used these st sn outdoor shower as towrl hooks. Great quality and value. Priced way better than competitors. Holding up well to the outdoor elements.
customer_reviews.author: DGNYC

customer_reviews.title: Worthless.
customer_reviews.text: It didn’t come with any hardware to attach it so it’s worthless.
customer_reviews.author: LCRC

customer_reviews.title: Good product, pretty
customer_reviews.text: Good product, pretty, sturdy and for a good price. Product image doesn't reflect the color properly, it is more towards "champagne" than "silver", which I prefer anyway. The product received had a minor dent, small enough for me to prefer not to go through the hassle of having it replaced, big enough for me not got rate it 5 stars. Overall I'm satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo S.

customer_reviews.title: Quality good but not for hanging towels!  Slides off.
customer_reviews.text: Quality is good but if you plan on using it for towels like I did, towels slide off and on to the floor. If for robes, it would be good.
customer_reviews.author: MiCaliGirl

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Looks fantastic. Extactly what I am looking for. I use the screws and very sturdy. Have not used the glue that comes with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Pi

customer_reviews.title: We stayed at the Intercontinental Hotel in Monterey and loved the spa-like bathroom
customer_reviews.text: We stayed at the Intercontinental Hotel in Monterey and loved the spa-like bathroom. This was one of the hooks in their bathroom. Very sophisticated looking and good construction. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Marion

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased four (4) hooks to use with bath towels (Pinterest idea). These hooks are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Chatonia

customer_reviews.title: This is not an adhesive hook. The name is misleading.
customer_reviews.text: This is not an adhesive hook. The name is misleading. You need to use screws and a screwdriver.
customer_reviews.author: GamsnEggs

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC!
customer_reviews.text: Love the look! Ordered 2 more. Easy to install! Looks great with all the other KES items. Ended up with the toilet paper holder, towel bar and towel ring all in brushed nickel. Looks very classy and modern!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice and did the job
customer_reviews.text: Mounted in shower to mount a shower basket for soaps and shampoo. Looks nice and did the job. The only thing that was not planed for was that the horizontal pipe is smaller that the standard shower pipe so did not mount exactly as planed, but did the job and looks real nice.
customer_reviews.author: Rabbi

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: It is very nice and exactly how it looks on photo. It is also very sturdy. I used the screws not the adhesive glue FYI.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: high quality stainless steel in a beautiful mirror finish
customer_reviews.text: its the little details that make me happy. easy to install heavy and beautiful
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I needed a hanger for my towel and shower caddy. These fit the bill. Strong and sturdy. I’m very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Great Elk Waters - author and reviewer for WeWan Institute and Society publishers

customer_reviews.title: Perfect touch!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Just what i was looking for, very high end looking!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't include back piece - useless
customer_reviews.text: This product shipped without including the back base piece where you would put the adhesive and then attach the hook. Useless product. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: More of a nickel finish than chrome.
customer_reviews.text: Although the description says it is a chrome finish, the actual finish is more of a nickel finish with warm undertones. It's very obvious next to my chrome fixtures that it does not match. Aside from the finish, it is a good quality hook, heavier than I thought it would be. Looks very nice if not putting it next to other chrome finishes.
customer_reviews.author: Marc M

customer_reviews.title: Great quality hooks
customer_reviews.text: High quality wall hooks that look great and are super sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Ania

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. We're using this on the wall opposite the ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. We're using this on the wall opposite the shower head. Our shower head is too slanted for a shower caddy. By putting this hook in the opposite wall we can hang a caddy from it and it works perfectly!! The horizontal piece is wide enough to fit probably any caddy. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Quality item wit good heft
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 3 different KES items for my bathroom. They were all good quality with a solid heft to them. One minor thing is they don't tell you what size hole to drill for the included anchors so you have to eyeball it and guess.
customer_reviews.author: MikeChi

customer_reviews.title: One was perfect; however
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two (2) of these. One was perfect; however, the other hook was not cut straight. Since it's in the closet, and too much trouble to ship back, I'll deal with it. My point is that don't expect Kohler quality.
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: Love the look
customer_reviews.text: Easy install. Love the look. Effective to hold leashes for the dogs near the door. Wanted to purchase more however out of stock & stock may not be replenished
customer_reviews.author: StlouisCards#13

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Handy to hang bath towel on next to shower door but does not allow towel to dry out
customer_reviews.author: MTBer

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome! They are great quality and look very nice
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! They are great quality and look very nice. Super easy to install. I use my own drywall anchors that I buy from Lowe’s for all my installations on stuff like this to keep them nice and tight.
customer_reviews.author: khodasc

customer_reviews.title: Great sleek view! Try to drill into stud
customer_reviews.text: The glue that comes with the item in case not drilling into a stud does not hold and we followed instructions as said - looks of the product is great
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, works great!
customer_reviews.text: These hooks work great. We use them in the bathroom for holding towels and hangers. They are functional but also look nice if nothing is hanging on them. We ended up buying 8 of them.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Nice sturdy hook
customer_reviews.text: Needed a so for hook to hang towels once you get out of shower. This so for hook looks great and is super sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Anita Avanesi

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, functional, and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, easily installed, fit securely, and the towel never falls off. Not too expensive either. Can’t ask for much more than that!
customer_reviews.author: SonSon

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality and appearance
customer_reviews.text: We put one of these hooks in each of the bathrooms to hold wet towels or our robes. They look very modern, updated, and are great to use. We plan to put some more of them up in the laundry room to hold wet coats this winter.
customer_reviews.author: annie

customer_reviews.title: Need nail and drilling
customer_reviews.text: The hook fell off, no way it will hold itself without nails.
customer_reviews.author: Pinky

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described.  Works great
customer_reviews.text: I've had a few of these mounted in the bathroom for a year. They look brand new still. Very sturdy. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: bobcharli

customer_reviews.title: Solid hook for good price
customer_reviews.text: It is a hefty and solid hook, and was easy to put up in just a few minutes!
customer_reviews.author: Dan J

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice and is functional
customer_reviews.text: Good fit and finish. Easy mounting bracket with hidden screws. I little small proportioned for a larger towel. Works best with items having a loop.
customer_reviews.author: H. L. B.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to instal & all parts included.
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to install... all parts were included. Purchased 2 more.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Cheap. Simple. Efficient.
customer_reviews.text: Has served me well for it's intended use of holding my bathrobe.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: These are great for a place you do want to drill holes. They work great, and look great too!
customer_reviews.author: donnarei

customer_reviews.title: It sucks.
customer_reviews.text: The "drill free" did not work. The screws did not work or fit at all, or at least I could not figure out how because the instructions included did not pertain to the hooks I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: k wulkowicz

customer_reviews.title: The screws don't fit the product and the wrong instructions were included
customer_reviews.text: The instructions were not even for this product. The screws did not fit, therefore i couldn't even hang this product on my door and i bought 3 of them. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: crystal

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The perfect hook for Bath Sheets for guests in the bathroom. Modern chic aesthetic.
customer_reviews.author: Akiko Ashley

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: I would buy again. Thank you for a very good product

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Love how it looks great for my daughters to hang their towels
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice and solid quality
customer_reviews.text: Easy to mount and complemented the brushed metal elements in our bathroom. I mounted it on our bathroom door, which meant I had to use a shorter screw than the one provided.
customer_reviews.author: Shep C. James

customer_reviews.title: Missing bracket as shown in instructions
customer_reviews.text: I am missing metal bracket for adhesive no drill install

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my bathrooms! Put one in each bathroom. I would highly recommend these!

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: Great bathroom hardware! Looks great and the quality is pretty good too!

customer_reviews.title: Will keep this brand in mind in the future!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install. Solid construction. Matches the related toilet paper holder well. Will keep this brand in mind in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Best match for our KES Towel holder
customer_reviews.text: We got the KES towel holder so this match the whole look for the bathroom and it's so cute... I wish I got the 2 pcs. for a cheaper price... If you have a plan in buying this better buy the 2 pcs package box it's cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous product.
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I were remodeling our bathroom and had gone to lowes to get a matching mirror, hand towel rack, toilet paper holder, and towel hooks. Well the towel hooks were $20 each and my husband was searching Amazon and found theses. Looked exactly like the $20 ones at lowes and fit in perfect with the set.
customer_reviews.author: Claire Lorenz

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Bought a couple of these to install when my bathroom got remodeled. Goes perfectly with the modern look I was going for and coordinates with the sink faucet. Love that it's real stainless steel versus some cheap plastic material.
customer_reviews.author: AATRivera

product_meta.title: KES Bathroom Towel Hook No Drill Robe Hook Shower Kitchen Wall Hanging Hooks Wall Mount SUS 304 Stainless Steel Polished Finish, A2164DG
feature_bullets: RUST PROOF: Constructed of Type 304 premium grade stainless steel, protecting against corrosion & rust and need trivial maintenance. Suitable for the humid environment such as bathroom and kitchen.

TWO INSTALLATION OPTIONS - Use included STRONG GLUE to install this hook in minutes. You can also choose screw-mounting with stainless steel screws and anchors in package. Screws are made from SUS 304 stainless steel and won't rust. MAX. Load: 5 KG screw-mount on solid concrete wall.
POLISHED FINISH: Hand polished stainless steel finish build to resist daily scratches corrosions and tarnishing.

APPLICABLE SURFACES: Drill-free installation is suitable for flat and smooth surfaces without dust or water, such as tile, glass, and metal. DO NOT apply this product on fabrics nor wallpaper as it may damage to these surfaces. Please wait for 48 hours before use.
ACCESSORIES INCLUDED: 1 x Towel Hook, Drill Free Glue Pack, Screws Pack, Installation Instruction. You can install the towel hook right away after you receive the package.
